data.title: Villa Franca Maria in Rättvik
data.meta_description: Find all information about Villa Franca Maria here and book easily at no extra costs.
data.text:
Set within 2.8 km of Siljansbadet Beach and 14 km of Dalhalla Amphitheatre in Rättvik, Villa Franca Maria offers accommodation with seating area. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. Guests can make use of the picnic area or the barbecue, or enjoy views of the garden and inner courtyard. All units come with a terrace with mountain views, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower. A patio with an outdoor dining area and lake views is offered in every unit. At the bed and breakfast, the units have bed linen and towels. As an added convenience, the bed and breakfast offers packed lunches for guests to bring on excursions and other trips off-property. Fitness classes are available at the property. Skiing and cycling can be enjoyed nearby, while a ski equipment rental service and a ski pass sales point are also available on-site. Vasaloppet Museum is 42 km from Villa Franca Maria, while Falun Mine is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Mora Airport, 51 km from the accommodation.

Please inform Villa Franca Maria in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Managed by a private host
